title: City Museum
description: The City Museum showcases local history, art, and cultural heritage with interactive exhibits and guided tours.

title: Central Park
description: A beautiful green space in the heart of the city, perfect for walking, picnics, and community events.

title: Riverside Market
description: A bustling marketplace with fresh produce, handmade crafts, and local delicacies every weekend.

title: Tech Innovation Hub
description: A business incubator supporting startups and entrepreneurs with workspace, mentorship, and networking.

title: Community Library
description: Offering thousands of books, digital resources, and free educational programs for all ages.

title: Grand Theater
description: Historic performing arts venue featuring plays, concerts, and film screenings throughout the year.

title: Sports Arena
description: Home to local sports teams and a venue for community fitness events, tournaments, and concerts.

title: Seaside Promenade
description: A scenic coastal walkway lined with restaurants, cafes, and shops overlooking the sea.
